properties.entry: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NAME=? , MEM_GENDER=? , MEM_BIRTHDAY=? , MEM_NICKNAME=? , MEM_PHONE=? , LOCAL_NO=? , MEM_EMAIL=? WHERE MEM_USERID=?

SELECT MEM_NO , LOCAL_NO , MEM_USERID , MEM_USERPWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_GENDER , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLL_DATE , B_LIST_CHECK , LEAVE_CHECK , MANAGER_CHECK , PROFILE_PATH , PROFILE_MODIFYNAME , PROFILE_ORIGNNAME , PROFILE_LOADNAME , LOCAL_SI , LOCAL_GU , LOCAL_DONG FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN LOCATION USING(LOCAL_NO) WHERE MEM_USERID =? AND LEAVE_CHECK = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET LEAVE_CHECK='Y' WHERE MEM_USERID=? AND MEM_USERPWD=?
SELECT SHIPPING_NO , MEM_NO , SHIPPING_ADDRESS , MEM_USERNAME , MEM_PHONE , SHIPPING_DEFAULT , SL_STATUS FROM SHIPPING_LOCATION WHERE MEM_NO=? AND SL_STATUS='Y'
SELECT LOCAL_NO , LOCAL_SI , LOCAL_GU , LOCAL_DONG FROM LOCATION WHERE LOCAL_NO=?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , POST_NAME , POST_ENROLL_DATE , POST_VIEWS FROM GROUP_PURCHASE G JOIN POST USING(POST_NO) WHERE BLIND_CHECK = 'N' AND POST_TYPE = 2 AND MEM_NO =? ORDER BY POST_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , POST_LIKES , POST_NAME , PROD_PRICE , BLIND_CHECK , THUMBNAIL_PATH , THUMBNAIL_FILENAME , THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH FROM LIKE_POST L JOIN POST P USING (POST_NO) WHERE BLIND_CHECK = 'N' AND L.MEM_NO=? ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE POST SET POST_LIKES=POST_LIKES-1 WHERE POST_NO=?
SELECT PHOTO_NO , POST_NO , PHOTO_PATH , PHOTO_FILENAME , PHOTO_LOADPATH FROM PHOTO P JOIN POST USING (POST_NO) WHERE MEM_NO =? ORDER BY POST_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , MEM_NO , POST_NAME , PROD_PRICE , PROD_STATUS , POST_ENROLL_DATE , THUMBNAIL_PATH , THUMBNAIL_FILENAME FROM POST P WHERE MEM_NO=? AND P.BLIND_CHECK ='N' AND PROD_STATUS='N' ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE POST SET BLIND_CHECK = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO=?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , MEM_NO , POST_NAME , PROD_PRICE , PROD_STATUS , POST_ENROLL_DATE , THUMBNAIL_PATH , THUMBNAIL_FILENAME FROM POST P WHERE MEM_NO=? AND P.BLIND_CHECK ='N' AND PROD_STATUS='Y' ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE POST SET BLIND_CHECK = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO=?
UPDATE POST SET PROD_STATUS = 'N' WHERE POST_NO=? AND BLIND_CHECK = 'N'
INSERT INTO SHIPPING_LOCATION ( SHIPPING_NO , MEM_NO , SHIPPING_ADDRESS , MEM_USERNAME , MEM_PHONE , SHIPPING_DEFAULT ) VALUES ( SEQ_SNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE SHIPPING_LOCATION SET SL_STATUS ='N' WHERE SHIPPING_NO=?
